KD may provide a model for the pathogenesis of PIMS-TS, not least because KD has a strong association with seasonal infections, but also because it is rarely associated with intercurrent infection at the time of manifesting the vasculitic processes (as has been evident in the above described cohorts). A number of surveillance studies have been established to better monitor the emergence of this clinical entity.
116 In Australia, surveillance undertaken by the Paediatric Active Enhanced Disease Surveillance network ( www.paeds.org.au) has not shown an increased frequency of KD across the period of the COVID-19 epidemic, which may be anticipated in light of the low community prevalence of SARS-CoV-2 to date.
